movie.title: Street Survivors: The True Story of the Lynyrd Skynyrd Plane Crash
movie.title_english: Street Survivors: The True Story of the Lynyrd Skynyrd Plane Crash
movie.title_long: Street Survivors: The True Story of the Lynyrd Skynyrd Plane Crash (2020)
movie.description_intro: The movie centers on drummer Artimus Pyle's experience as a band member in Lynyrd Skynyrd and the tragically fateful day the plane they rented that crashed in the late evening in the swamps of Gillsburg ,MS on October 20th ,1977 and took the lives of singer Ronnie Van Zant , guitarist Steve Gaines ,his sister back up singer Cassie Gaines , road manager Dean Kilpatrick and the two pilots . This movie focuses on the hours leading up to and the day of the event and the aftermath.
movie.description_full: The movie centers on drummer Artimus Pyle's experience as a band member in Lynyrd Skynyrd and the tragically fateful day the plane they rented that crashed in the late evening in the swamps of Gillsburg ,MS on October 20th ,1977 and took the lives of singer Ronnie Van Zant , guitarist Steve Gaines ,his sister back up singer Cassie Gaines , road manager Dean Kilpatrick and the two pilots . This movie focuses on the hours leading up to and the day of the event and the aftermath.

movies.title: Deep in My Heart
movies.summary: Biographic movie about the American composer Sigmund Romberg.
movies.description_full: Biographic movie about the American composer Sigmund Romberg.
movies.synopsis: Biographic movie about the American composer Sigmund Romberg.

movies.title: The Agony and the Ecstasy
movies.summary: Pope Julius II (Sir Rex Harrison) is eager to leave behind works by which he will be remembered. To this end he cajoles Michelangelo (Charlton Heston) into painting the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel. When not on the battlefield uniting Italy, the Pope nags Michelangelo to speed up his painful work on the frescoes.

When not on the battlefield uniting Italy, the Pope nags Michelangelo to speed up his painful work on the frescoes.

movies.title: Lion of the Desert
movies.summary: In Fascist Italy pre-World War II, the cruel General Rodolfo Graziani is directly assigned by Benito Mussolini to fight in the colonial war in Libya to vanquish the Arab nation. However, his troops are frequently defeated by the national leader Omar Mukhtar and his army of Bedouins. But the Butcher of Ethiopia and Libya uses a dirty war against the natives, slaughtering women, children, and aged people, to subdue Mukhtar.

movies.title: Fat Man and Little Boy
movies.summary: In real life, Robert Oppenheimer was the scientific head of the Manhattan Project, the secret wartime project in New Mexico where the first atomic bombs were designed and built. General Leslie Groves was in overall command of it. This film reenacts the project with an emphasis on their relationship.

General Leslie Groves was in overall command of it. This film reenacts the project with an emphasis on their relationship.
